attributes.action: Help to evacuate Palestinians from Gaza
attributes.additional_details: We are deeply concerned about the welfare of Palestinians in Gaza. Children make up almost half of Gaza's population. Please do something to ensure residents are safely evacuated.
attributes.background: Please provide financial aid or military support to the Palestinians in Gaza to help with the evacuation efforts.
